citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 A.M. on
24-OCT-17.
A telephone call was made to the licensee who indicated that he would not return home for several hours.

narrative:
